Name: Unleash the Elements
Story Background: In the midst of chaos, the raw energy of the elements is unleashed, wreaking havoc upon the battlefield as nature's fury is unshackled.
Ability: Unleash the Elements deals 3 damage to each creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
Appearance Description: A swirling tempest of elemental energies manifesting as torrents of fire, lightning, and primal forces, engulfing the battlefield in a cataclysmic display of raw natural power.
